name: Coffee Dessert Making Salon - food maker games & candy ice cream make for kids!
name_original: Coffee Dessert Making Salon - food maker games & candy ice cream make for kids!
description:
Can you make delicious drinks at the Coffee Shop? They go together so well with yummy desserts!

Make Coffees, Lattes, Cappuccinos, and Cafe Mochas for your guests?

Play a super fun new Food Maker game for Kids today!!

Have soo much fun!! Enjoy!!
